Title: Requires nursing homes and assisted living facilities to provide and maintain automated external defibrillators
Summary: Requires nursing homes and assisted living facilities to provide and maintain automated external defibrillators in quantities and types deemed by the commissioner to be adequate to ensure ready and appropriate access for use during emergencies.
LawCode: Amd ยง225, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring nursing homes and assisted living facilities to provide and maintain automated external defibrillators
